mil.nga.giat.geowave.accumulo.mapreduce

Interface HadoopDataAdapter<T,W extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the native type
    W - the writable type
    All Superinterfaces:
    DataAdapter<T>, DataReader<Object>, Persistable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FeatureDataAdapter, RasterDataAdapter

    public interface HadoopDataAdapter<T,W extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends DataAdapter<T>
    This is an interface that extends data adapter to allow map reduce jobs to easily convert hadoop writable objects to and from the geowave native representation of the objects. This allow for generally applicable map reduce jobs to be written using base classes for the mapper that can handle translations.
